item.description:
Hello my friends! I usually don't post events such as these, but this a girl who is suffering from cancer and many of her medical needs are no longer being covered by insurance.

Sabina La Rosa Davoren is leading the charge for this special event to raise money for her sister.

They are also looking for raffle items as well. If you can help please call Sabina at the number below.

You can make a difference in someone's life!

Date: Saturday, March 30, 2013 Â 2pm-6pm

Event Admission: $25.00 per person

Includes: Buffet style dinner, raffle and musical entertainment by Tommy Faienza & Enterprise Music

FOR MORE INFO OR TICKETS CALL SABINA AT 860 794-4772

More details to follow.

80% of all the proceeds will go directly to the Lori La Rosa Fund.
item.name: Lori La Rosa Martucci Fundraiser Dinner - Sat. Mar 30
